about: Our expertise in this niche international taxation market allows us to help companies and individuals with their foreign filing requirements, tax filings in the United States, and global tax planning. Sometimes something as simple as a lack of coordination between the two tax professionals in each respective country can expose the client to a tax liability at the highest marginal rate in both countries. We work with the foreign tax professional to understand each other’s needs and create the most efficient tax planning strategy for our clients.
